_header: All worthy men that loves to hear
_description: The Sege of Melayne, a Charlemagne Romance — in 12-line stanzas

BLAdd31042.First Lines: All worthy men that luffes to hereOff cheuallry þat by fore vs were…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …And Baners to þe walles displayedeAnd Bendis vp þaire engyne…
BLAdd31042.Note: Ends incomplete; 1602 lines.  Word written in error and crossed through after “by” in second line.
BLAdd31042.Attributed Title: Here Bygynnys the Sege off Melayne (f. 66v).
BLAdd31042.Editions:
Herrtage,  Sidney John Hervon,
                        ed.
